articles.author: Suvrat Kothari
articles.title: Canada’s Tariff Cut Just Made This High-Tech Chinese EV 50% Cheaper - InsideEVs
articles.description: A high-end electric performance SUV that's made in China is about to get dramatically cheaper for Canadians.
articles.content: Lotus Technology, the British sports car maker majority-owned by Chinas Geely group, is welcoming Canadas decision to reset its tariff policy thats set to result in a dramatic price reduction for its… [+2547 chars]
